column2: Lianluo Smart Ltd. engages in the development and marketing of medical wearable devices, smart devices and ecosystem platform. The company is headquartered in Beijing, Beijing and currently employs 98 full-time employees. The Company, through its subsidiaries and affiliate, distributes branded medical equipment, such as sleep apnea machines, ventilator air compressors, Color Dopller Imaging Machine and laryngoscope. The company also has the distribution rights for a range of international medical equipment suppliers for products, including ventilator, Color Dopller Imaging Machine, laryngoscope, sleep apnea machines and other medical equipment accessories. The firm develops and distributes medical devices focusing primarily on sleep respiratory solutions to obstructive sleep apnea syndrome (OSAS). Its distribution offerings are medical equipment used in the operating room, the intensive care unit (ICU) and the emergency room.
